function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Diverse nature attributes and their classification in architectural design","Impact":"Inadequate classification can lead to misunderstanding and misinterpretation of the role of nature in architectural design, leading to poor design choices.","Mitigation":"Develop a standardized classification system for nature attributes in architectural design and provide clear guidelines for their usage.","Technologies":"Digital modeling and simulation software for testing the impact of nature attributes on architectural design.","People":"Architects, designers, and urban planners","Owner":"Architecture and design organizations"},{"Description":"Divergent elements in nature-based architectural design theories","Impact":"Divergent elements can create confusion and inconsistency in the application of nature-based architectural design theories, leading to design conflicts and inefficiencies.","Mitigation":"Establish a unified framework for nature-based architectural design theories and encourage interdisciplinary collaboration to resolve differences.","Technologies":"Collaborative design platforms and knowledge sharing tools for architects and designers.","People":"Architectural theorists, researchers, and design educators","Owner":"Architectural education institutions and professional design associations"},{"Description":"Psychological experience of nature in architectural design","Impact":"Inadequate consideration of psychological experience can result in environments that do not effectively promote human well-being and productivity.","Mitigation":"Integrate principles of environmental psychology into architectural design education and practice, and prioritize user-centered design approaches.","Technologies":"User experience research tools and environmental psychology software for analyzing the impact of design on human psychology.","People":"Architects, environmental psychologists, and building occupants","Owner":"Architectural firms and research institutions"}]}
